title: Stellar Evolution
description: In Falling Stars, you were introduced to The Forgotten and Hush (Hushed Mentality), their lives written for the world to read. In this follow up novella, find out what happens after the tours have ended. Who can persevere under the pressure of love in the public eye? Who will fall apart? And who will become almost unrecognizable?Some stars last for an eternity, some stars fade, and others evolve.** Not a stand alone. To fully enjoy this novella, I suggest you first read Falling Stars. **
author: Sadie Grubor
